TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewContentAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that indicate the alignment of content within a cell.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. For more information, see [How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#072](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_30_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#072](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_30_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment BottomCenter = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the bottom and horizontally at the center of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment BottomLeft = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the bottom and horizontally at the left of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment BottomRight = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the bottom and horizontally at the right of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment MiddleCenter = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned at the vertical and horizontal center of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment MiddleLeft = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the middle and horizontally at the left of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment MiddleRight = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the middle and horizontally at the right of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment NotSet = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment TopCenter = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the top and horizontally at the center of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment TopLeft = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the top and horizontally at the left of a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment TopRight = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the top and horizontally at the right of a cell.
